matchLabelKeys.description: A list of pod label keys to select the pods over which spreading will be calculated
matchLabelKeys.title: matchLabelKeys

maxSkew.description: Describe the degree to which Pods may be unevenly distributed
maxSkew.title: maxSkew

minDomains.description: Indicate a minimum number of eligible domains
minDomains.title: minDomains

nodeAffinityPolicy.description: Indicate how we will treat Pod's nodeAffinity/nodeSelector when calculating pod topology spread skew
nodeAffinityPolicy.title: nodeAffinityPolicy

nodeTaintsPolicy.description: Indicate how we will treat node taints when calculating pod topology spread skew
nodeTaintsPolicy.title: nodeTaintsPolicy

topologyKey.description: Specify the key of node labels
topologyKey.title: topologyKey

whenUnsatisfiable.description: Indicate how to deal with a Pod if it doesn't satisfy the spread constraint
whenUnsatisfiable.title: whenUnsatisfiable
